participant_1.name: Amina
participant_1.personality: Amina is resilient and determined, having faced hardships in her past. She is compassionate and empathetic towards others, especially those who have faced similar struggles.
participant_1.background: i was forced to marry when i was a. my aunt helped me escape when i was of. i was born in somalia. now i live in the united states.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Jake is friendly and outgoing, always eager to make new friends. He has a playful sense of humor and a love for animals, particularly his German Shepherd.
participant_2.background: my favorite color is grey. i am terrified of scorpions. i have a german shepherd named barnaby. my father drove a car for nascar. i'm employed by the us postal service.
